name: Terrassa Buildings Challenge 2015
tagline: Image retrieval and classification powered by computer vision.
body:
The Terrassa Building Challenge 2015 consists in two different tasks to be solved on the Terrassa Buildings 900 dataset:
* **Task 1 Retrieval :** Given a query image from a building in Terrassa, search in a collection of images to generate a ranked list of results.
* **Task 2 Classification :** Identify which building is represented in the image, if any.

## Results

| Team                  | mAP (retrieval) | Average F1 (classification) |
| -------------         | --------------- | -------------------- |
| [Egara View](http://gdsa-upc.github.io/Egara-View/)                     | 0.289             | 0.759                  |
| [Search Around](http://gdsa-upc.github.io/Search-Around/)               | 0.233             | 0.661                  |
| [What a building !](http://gdsa-upc.github.io/What-a-building-App/)     | 0.254             | 0.006                  |
| [RdE](http://gdsa-upc.github.io/RdE/)                                   | 0.239             | 0.198                  |
| [Building Recognizer](http://gdsa-upc.github.io/Building-Recognizer/)   | 0.153             | 0.125                  |
| [Discover Terrassa](http://gdsa-upc.github.io/Discover-Terrassa/)       | 0.006             | TBD                    |
| Random results                                                          | 0.066             | 0.007                  |
(click on the team name to visit their project site containing source code and further details)

## Dataset
The used dataset was collected by the students using only Creative Commons images. The images and annotations can be downloaded from [this page](https://imatge.upc.edu/web/resources/terrassa-buildings-900) from the [UPC Image Processing Group](https://imatge.upc.edu/web/).

Course Instructors Fall 2015: 
[Amaia Salvador](https://imatge.upc.edu/web/people/amaia-salvador) and [Xavier Gir√≥-i-Nieto](https://imatge.upc.edu/web/people/xavier-giro) 

[ETSEIAAT](http://www.eet.upc.edu/?set_language=en), [Universitat Politecnica de Catalunya](http://www.upc.edu/?set_language=en), Terrassa, Catalonia
